## BitcoinsMoneyp.getLiquidityMiningStake() method

Get the amount of Uniswap RBTC/BPD LP tokens currently staked by an address in liquidity mining.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getLiquidityMiningStake(address?: string, overrides?: BitcoinsCallOverrides): Promise<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address whose LP stake should be retrieved. |
|  overrides | [BitcoinsCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.bitcoinscalloverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt;
